options.description: Number of results per page. Default 25. Ignored without page parameter. Must be non-negative

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'charge' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'datapoint' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'goal' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'datapoint' THEN SHOW parameter 'goalName'
IF resource == 'goal' AND operation == 'uncle' THEN SHOW parameter 'goalName'
IF resource == 'goal' AND operation IN ["get", "update", "refresh", "shortCircuit", "stepDown", "cancelStepDown"] THEN SHOW parameter 'goalName'
IF resource == 'charge' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'amount'
IF resource == 'datapoint' AND operation == 'createAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'datapoints'
IF resource == 'goal' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'slug'
IF resource == 'goal' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'goal' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'goal_type'
IF resource == 'goal' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'gunits'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'datapoint' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'datapoint' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'datapoint' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'value'
IF resource == 'datapoint' AND operation IN ["update", "delete", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'datapointId'
IF resource == 'datapoint' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'charge' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'goal' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'goal' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'goal' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'goal' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'goal' AND operation == 'getArchived' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'datapoint' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF /returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'page'
IF /returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'per'
IF resource == 'datapoint' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
